name: Smudge
author: Joao
description:
The smudge brush allows the user to paint over different parts of the canvas and mix colors based on pumping/damping quantum channels.

The quality of the effect is controlled by several parameters:

 ğŸ”¹ Invert Luminosity â†’ ON = first color light, OFF = first color dark

 ğŸ”¸ Each stroke has a new color.
